alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 11:21PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of Lamoille, northern Caledonia, Orleans, northern Essex, northeastern Chittenden, north central Washington and southeastern Franklin Counties through 1215 AM EST... At 1119 PM EST, heavy snow was reported along a line from just east of Milton northeastward through Canaan Vermont. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds 20 mph or greater, and visibility less than a mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Breezy winds and burst of snow will create low visibility which may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Newport City, Island Pond, South Burlington, Morrisville, Orleans, Derby Center, Charleston, Johnson Village, Newport Town, Cambridge, Glover, Albany, Westford, Brunswick, Hyde Park, Montgomery, Essex Junction Village, Troy, and Greensboro Bend. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 80 and 85. Interstate 91 between mile markers 145 and 177.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
